Html:
Hi my problem is that GraphLayout TGraph must be IBidirectionalGraph

public partial class GraphLayout<TVertex, TEdge, TGraph> : GraphCanvas
        where TVertex : class
        where TEdge : IEdge<TVertex>
        where TGraph : class, IBidirectionalGraph<TVertex, TEdge>

Is there any particular reason for that?

Because i badly need to visualize unidirectional graph and shortest paths in that graph between selected nodes.
